      • addInput

        public void addInput(java.lang.String serviceURI,
                     java.lang.String label,
                     java.lang.Boolean isRequired,
                     java.lang.Boolean DatatypeProperty,
                     java.lang.String classRDF,
                     java.lang.String fixedValue)
        Create new input resource
        Parameters:
        serviceURI - String representing the URI of the Service associated to the new input
        label - String representing the label of the input (in the url ...?label=value&otherlabel=othervalue)
        isRequired - Boolean telling if the input is required or optional
        classRDF - String representing the URI of the class associated to the resource

      • editOutput

        public void editOutput(java.lang.String outputURI,
                       java.lang.Boolean isData,
                       java.lang.Boolean DatatypeProperty,
                       java.lang.String content,
                       java.lang.String classRDF)
        Remove old properties and add new properties (RDF:type, content, isData)
        Parameters:
        outputURI - String representing the URI of the subject resource
        isData - Boolean telling if the output contains data or other nodes
        content - String representing the content (String or Number)
        classRDF - String representing the URI of the class associated to the resource

      • addOutput

        public void addOutput(java.lang.String serviceURI,
                      java.lang.String label,
                      java.lang.Boolean isData,
                      java.lang.Boolean DatatypeProperty,
                      java.lang.String content,
                      java.lang.String classRDF,
                      java.lang.String parentURI)
        Create new output resource
        Parameters:
        serviceURI - serviceURI String representing the URI of the Service associated to the new output
        label - String representing the label of the output
        isData - Boolean telling if the output contains data or other nodes
        content - String representing the content (String or Number)
        classRDF - String representing the URI of the class associated to the resource
        parentURI - String representing the URI of the parent of the new output
